description:
the Ronson 50 is an almost <good>unreal</good> SMG produced by <info>Ronson<7info>.
Nicknamed '<info>Boneshaker</info>' the 50 is an SMG that uses the <info>LBM</info> round making for a very manouverable yet <bad>loud</bad> and <good>powerful</good> small weapon.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a base red dot sight with a rail to mount another sight, it also has a quite balanced rounded stock.

This weapon is <good>decent</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Ronson 55 is an almost <good>unreal</good> SMG produces by <info>Ronson</info>. it's the successor to the Ronson 50.
<good>Twin 'recoilless' alternating barrels</good> allow for accuracy and an extremely <good>high rate of fire</good>. One of the most innovative and deadly submachine guns available anywhere.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a base red dot sight with no rail to mount another sight, it also has a quite balanced rounded stock.

This weapon is <good>decent</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Ronson LBM is a heavy LMG produced by <info>Ronson</info>.
Ronson Large Bore Machine Gun. Uses <info>heavy clip</info> instead of a belt to accommodate <info>extra large rounds</info>, the LBM can devastate most targets with ease.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a rail to mount a sight, it also has a quite balanced stock. it also features an underbarrel bipod, making it <bad>impossible to mount</bad> anything under the barrel.

This weapon is <good>decent</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
